TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ValidatorCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class ValidatorCollection Implements ICollection
public ref class ValidatorCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection

summary.span: 公开一个 引用数组。

span.span: Exposes an array of references.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个引用是关联有一个包含请求的页上的验证服务器控件。Each reference is associated with a validation server control contained on the requested page. 这些控件将自己添加到此集合时事件处理对象。These controls add themselves to this collection when the event of the object is handled. 他们删除本身时事件处理对象。They remove themselves when the event of the object is handled. 类继承这两种方法从类。The class inherits both of these methods from the class. 你可以访问此集合、 其方法和通过其属性属性。You can access this collection, its methods, and its properties through the property. 如果此集合中的任何验证程序的测试的条件失败，属性设置为`false`。If the tested condition of any validator in this collection fails, the property is set to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过对集合的访问属性和使用方法来循环访问值。The following code example demonstrates how to access the collection through the property and use the method to iterate through the values. [!code-csharp[ValidatorCollection_GetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ValidatorCollection_GetEnumerator/CS/validatorcollection_getenumerator.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[ValidatorCollection_GetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ValidatorCollection_GetEnumerator/VB/validatorcollection_getenumerator.vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The validation server control to add.

summary.span: 将指定的验证服务器控件添加到 集合。

span.span: Adds the specified validation server control to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当添加到集合对象通过属性，实现参与验证。When added to the collection of a object through the property, the implementation takes part in validation. 其方法调用连同的所有其他验证程序的方法。Its method is called together with the methods of all other validators. 确定然后共享所有的验证程序是否对象作为一个整体是否有效。All validators then share in determining whether the object as a whole is valid. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. [!code-csharp[ValidatorCollection_Add#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ValidatorCollection_Add/CS/validatorcollection_add.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ValidatorCollection_Add#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ValidatorCollection_Add/VB/validatorcollection_add.vb#1)]
